p.e:
Want to join our Urban 
   Documentary? Get the remote out
of its case and position the drone lights
 with the buttons. Once the drone lights
        are set, click "DONE" and then 
           teach us robots to dance!

b: when told by any robotext then become next
when told by any roboreset then become 1
when told by any persistrobo then become previous
when told by any roboreset then become 1
when told by any stageset then become next in 30s
when told by any stageset then become next in 30s
